Strava makes fitness tracking social. We house your entire active journey in one spot – and you get to share it with friends. Here’s how:

• Record everything – runs, rides, hikes, yoga and over 30 other sport types. Think of Strava as the home of your movement.

• Discover anywhere – our Routes tool uses de-identified Strava data to intelligently recommend popular routes based on your preferences. You can also build your own.

• Build a support network – Strava’s about celebrating movement. Here you’ll find your community and cheer each other on.

• Train smarter – get data insights to understand your progress and see how you improve. Your Training Log is the record of all your workouts.

• Get more from your workout – Powered by AI, Athlete Intelligence turns workout data into into instant insights. Keeping you motivated and ready for the next workout – without the guesswork.

• Move safer – share your real-time location with loved ones while outdoors for an extra layer of safety.

• Sync your favourite apps and devices – Strava is compatible with thousands of them (Apple Watch, Fitbit, Garmin – you name it).

• Join and create challenges – join millions in monthly challenges to chase new goals, collect digital badges and stay accountable.

• Embrace the unfiltered – your feed on Strava is filled with real efforts from real people. That’s how we motivate each other.

• Whether you’re a world-class athlete or a total beginner, you belong here. Just record and go.

Strava includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.
Strava uses HealthKit to export your Strava activities into the Health app and to read heart rate and biometric data.

You can subscribe and pay on the App Store, using your Apple ID. Payment will be charged to your Apple ID at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renew may be turned off after purchase by going to the ‘Manage Subscription’ page in settings. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. The subscription will renew at the same cost.

Terms of Service: https://www.strava.com/legal/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.strava.com/legal/privacy

Live in sync with your cycle using Flo, the world’s most popular female health app. Get personalised insights and predictions on your body.

Whether you want to predict your period, get pregnant, track your pregnancy, or better understand your symptoms, Flo is your all-in-one female health partner. Join over 420 million members.

With Flo, you can:
- Keep your data safe: Flo is the first period and ovulation tracker to achieve dual ISO 27001 and ISO 27701 Certifications (aka gold standards in data protection).
- Feel more understood: Share your Flo insights via Flo for Partners to feel more connected, understood, and supported.
- Get an extra layer of protection: Anonymous Mode means no one, not even Flo, can identify you based on your health data.
- Join a supportive community: Secret Chats is where members can discuss topics and connect with others on the same journey.
- Access reliable health information: Flo collaborates with a globally recognised organisation dedicated to reproductive health and rights, ensuring trustworthy support for your health journey.

With Flo Premium, you can enjoy:
- Monthly cycle reports
- Symptom predictions and patterns
- Tailored prediction insights
- Detailed pregnancy tracking
- Full access to Flo for Partners
- A 24/7 virtual Health Assistant
- All articles, videos, and courses reviewed by 140+ health experts

New! Flo supports perimenopause:
- Know what might be perimenopause and how to tune in to your body’s changes.
- Get clarity on common perimenopause symptoms and what can help.
- Make more informed health decisions and identify what you need to feel your best.

Start tracking your cycle for free today.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
https://flo.health/privacy-policy  
https://flo.health/terms-of-use 

Connect with Flo:
Web: flo.health
TikTok: @flotracker
Instagram: @flotracker

Please note: Flo is not a diagnostic tool and should not be used as a method of contraception or to facilitate conception. Predictions and insights provided by the app are intended for informational purposes only and are not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider for any health concerns or decisions.

Flo uses HealthKit to read menstrual cycle data and export your Flo activities to the Health app.

If you have any difficulties using the app, contact Flo via support@flo.health.

Notice of Access Permission:
Flo may request permission for:
- In-app notifications or reminders.
- Uploading photos to specific forum discussions.
- Uploading audio recordings to closed group chats.
Content sharing is entirely optional. Flo does not automatically access your content. You can select what you want to share.

Your go-to, integrated health and fitness companion. Whether you want to kick-start your fitness life, keep track of your health, or conveniently manage your smart wearable devices, the Huawei Health app has what you're looking for. Keep your data private, or share it with your loved ones, the power's yours. The latest in health and fitness technology, made simple, secure, and easy to use.

Keeps Up with Your Every Move
Keep track of your health journey. Huawei Health records your activity, supporting over 100 different sports, from beginner to advanced levels. See your workout data clearly every step of the way, so you can be sure you're reaching your goals. A wonderful world of fitness at the tip of your fingers.

Run How You Want
A simpler way to run that can benefit anyone. The app is able to record and map out your route as you're running, all while displaying key information so you can stay on target.

An Amazing Journey
Share your health journey with your friends and family. Your outdoor workout routes can be generated into videos with music for you to proudly share. Use Dynamic tracking to create videos to share on social media to inspire yourself and others with your fitness journey.

A New View on Health
See your life in amazing detail with Huawei Health stats. The app keeps records of your heart rate, weight, sleep quality, step count and more. All your data is shown in clear, dynamic graphs so you have a better understanding of your health in a more accessible way.

[health package]
·Synchronize with the weight data in healthkit. When you use the healthy weight data of Huawei mobile phone, this data will be synchronized and recorded in healthkit.
·Synchronize with motion data in healthkit. You can automatically synchronize the exercise data recorded in Huawei health to healthkit. Similarly, Huawei sports health can also obtain the exercise data from healthkit.

--------------------
Huawei Health app is not intended for medical use, and all data is for reference only.
You should seek a doctor’s advice in addition to using this app and before making any medical decisions.

--------------------
[Description of auto-renewing subscriptions]

--Subscription period: 1 month

--Payment: Debit through the user's iTunes account, and the user will pay immediately after confirming the purchase
--Renewal: Apple’s iTunes account will be deducted within 24 hours of expiration. After the deduction is successful, the subscription period will be extended by one subscription period

Solution 1. Open the Appstore on your phone, click the blue avatar icon in the upper right corner, and then go to "Subscription"> "Huawei Sports Health" to cancel the subscription.
Solution 2: 24 hours before the expiration of the current subscription period, go to the iTunes/Apple ID "Settings Management" page and turn off the automatic renewal. Cancellation within 24 hours before expiration will result in a subscription fee.

bloater helps you achieve a leaner, more defined face with AI-powered analysis and expert-guided debloating exercises. ** Top Rating Reproductive Health App ** 
 
Check out the most widely-used period, ovulation & pregnancy tracker, which has been helping to improve the well-being of over 300,000,000 women across 45+ countries in the past decade. 
 
We understand your concerns about your private data security, especially with the recent news.
Here's how we protect your data:
• You can use our app without creating an account.
• You remain COMPLETELY ANONYMOUS while using our app.
• You can DELETE ALL DATA in 1 click whenever you want.
 
At every stage of your life, we safeguard your well-being. 
 
PERIOD & CYCLE CALENDAR
We'll remind you of the dates when your next period starts and ends on time. It's useful whether you have irregular or regular menses. Better? You'll receive tailored PMS advice and instant menstrual pain relief guidance.
 
OVULATION & FERTILITY TRACKER
We help you calculate your most fertile days and analyze your fertility window based on your unique cycle. You can get pregnant naturally ASAP by learning your CHANCE OF CONCEPTION every day.
 
PREGNANCY MODE: WEEK-BY-WEEK 
Follow your baby's weekly growth. Use our due date calculator to find out when your baby's BIG DAY will be and count down it.
 
BIRTH CONTROL PLANNER
Quickly record and stay on track with your contraceptive methods like pills, rings, patches, injections, IUDs, or implants. You can customize the reminder message for individual services.
 
PILL REMINDER
Set start date, interval, durations, and dose quantity for any medication, drugs, or supplements. So you won't forget to take pills when life gets busy.
 
SYMPTOM PREDICTIONS & TIPS
Record your symptoms during any life stage. Get predictions and courses to learn how to deal with them. Take breast self-exam monthly to find abnormalities early.
 
>>Key Features:
- Accurate prediction & reminders of menstruation & the most fertile days 
- Track the cycle lengths, flow intensity, when you are ovulating, birth control methods, etc.
- Log 58 symptoms, 67 moods, and energy levels to know your menstrual pattern
- Track daily chance of getting pregnant with BBT, cervical mucus, ovulation & pregnancy test records
- Baby's due date countdown
- Baby's weekly growth tracker
- Export a health report with charts for self-archive or doctors
- Insights from fertility specialists
- PIN code, Face ID, & Fingerprint lock to protect your private data
- Daily health tracker: weight, hydration, sleep, mood, sex, steps, etc.
- Breast self-exam guidance
- Multiple accounts to track for different, for example, mother/daughter 
- Unlimited app themes & pets
- Available in 39 languages
- Sync data with Apple Health
- Backup and restore data between devices
 
Note: Period Calendar should not be used to replace any form of contraceptive method.

Track progress toward your nutrition, water, fitness, and weight loss goals with MyFitnessPal. This all-in-one food tracker and health app is like having a nutrition coach, meal planner, and food diary with you at all times.

MyFitnessPal isn’t another restrictive diet app. This is a health app to help you learn about your habits … see how you eat … make smarter food choices … find motivation & support ... and conquer your health goals.

Download and start your free 30-day Premium trial to access exclusive food tracking, fitness logging tools, and expert guidance. You’ll soon discover why MyFitnessPal is the #1 food and nutrition tracker in the U.S., a GQ 2020 Fitness Awards “Best Fitness App,” and has been featured in the New York Times, Wall Street Journal, the Today Show, and U.S. News & World Report.

SO MUCH MORE THAN A CALORIE TRACKER & FOOD JOURNAL

It’s like having a dietitian, personal trainer, and nutrition coach at your fingertips.

Log Food – Easy-to-use tools make food tracking quick and simple
Record Activity – Add workouts and steps with the fitness tracker
Customize Your Goals – Weight loss, weight gain, weight maintenance, nutrition & fitness
See Your Progress – Track at a glance, or analyze nutrition & calories in detail
Learn From a Registered Dietitian – Meal Plans customized for your target calories, whether you want to lose or gain weight—with access to our Meal Planner tool
Stay Inspired – 500+ healthy goal-focused recipes and 50 workouts keep routines fresh and fun
Connect With Community – Find friends and motivation in our active forums

A CLOSER LOOK AT FEATURES & BENEFITS

Gain Valuable Insights Through Food Logging

Discover which foods fuel you best. It’s not just a diet app, calorie counter to lose weight, or a faster way to fat loss—it’s about holding yourself accountable and understanding what you put in your body.

One of the Largest Food Databases – Track calories in over 14 million foods (including restaurant dishes)
Fast & Easy Food Tracker Tools – Type to search, add foods from your history, or quick-add calories
Bar Code & Meal Scan: Log store-bought foods and entire meals using your phone’s camera
Calorie Tracker – Automatically count calories and see your daily progress
Macro Tracker – See carbs, fat & protein breakdown by gram or percentage—no need for a separate carb tracker or keto diet app!
Nutrition Tracker and Insights – Analyze nutrition intake and set specific goals for macros, cholesterol, sodium, fiber & more
Water Logging – Easily keep track of your water intake. 

Customize Your App Experience

Choose settings that help you achieve your goals.

Custom Goals – Track calories by meal or day, set up macro goals & more
Personalized Dashboards – Pick stats you want to see at a glance
Net Carbs Mode/Carb Tracker – To simplify a low carb or keto diet, view net (not total) carbs
Protein Counter – Set your protein goals and track how much you eat during the day
Add Your Own Foods/Meal Tracker – Save recipes and meals for quick logging
Connect 50+ Apps & Devices – From fitness tracker and smartwatch apps, including the Health app
Track With Apple Watch – A calorie tracker, water tracker, and macro tracker on your watch face.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS

MyFitnessPal is free to download and use. If you upgrade to MyFitnessPal Premium, we offer monthly & annual auto-renewing subscriptions.

Payment is charged to your credit card through your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription renews automatically unless you turn off auto-renewal in iTunes Account Settings after purchase, or cancel your subscription at least 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period.

View our full terms & conditions and privacy policy: https://www.myfitnesspal.com/privacy-and-terms

Focus, relax, and sleep through the power of sound. Endel creates AI-powered sounds designed to support your everyday life. Backed by science, and enjoyed by millions worldwide.

Endel is powered by its patented core AI technology. It takes inputs like location, environment, and heart rate, to create the optimal personalized soundscape. This happens on the fly and allows Endel to reconnect your state with your circadian rhythm.

Get access to the following classic soundscapes at home, work, or on the move to relax, concentrate, and minimize distractions and brain fatigue:


• Focus – boosts your productivity by helping you concentrate for longer

• Sleep – soothes you into a deep sleep with soft, gentle sounds

• Relax – calms your mind to create feelings of comfort and safety

• Move – feel grounded and present while walking, hiking, or running


ENDEL PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION


Alongside the classics, the Premium package contains the following Endel Soundscapes and features:

• Colored Noise – choose one of 9 colors of noise to focus, relax, sleep, and mask outside sound

• Study – improves concentration and keeps you calm while studying or working

• Dynamic Focus – get your perfect productivity support with real-time sound tuning

• Hibernation – nourish your ears with cozy sounds for cold-season slumber

• Nature Elements – nurture the mind with sounds of nature, your way

• Rainy Outside – cozy up to the gentle patter of rain, blended with sleep-aiding sounds

• Recovery – revives your wellbeing with sounds engineered to lower anxiety

• Spatial Orbit – venture into a more peaceful dimension with an immersive Spatial Audio experience

• Focus Timer – the famous interval work method, upgraded with science-backed Focus sounds


On top of the much-loved original Endel soundscapes, Endel works with innovative artists and thinkers to create unique experiences. These collaborative Endel Soundscapes are available for Premium users:


• James Blake: Wind Down – prepare your body for sleep with soothing sounds from an award-winning artist

• Grimes: AI Lullaby – supports sleep for babies and adults with original sounds and vocals from Grimes

• Plastikman: Deeper Focus – a deep focus techno soundscape created with Richie Hawtin

• Alan Watts: Wiggly Wisdom – soothing and motivation spoken word soundscape, infused with the playful wisdom from Alan Watts

• Miguel: Clarity Trip – elevate your every step with original sounds from Miguel

Endel Pacific is the patented technology that powers our apps and integrations. 

All soundscapes are available offline.

Apart from the Premium sounds and features, Endel Premium users get access to the exclusive Apple Podcast shows.


SUBSCRIPTION TERMS


Skip the payment screen by tapping “X” in the top-right corner of the offer. The Free Edition of Endel will start automatically.

Reach your best running goals with Runna: your go-to running coach and training partner for every distance and goal! With tailored training plans built by world-class coaches to help you achieve your goals. 

Whether you're lacing up your Nikes for a casual 5k or preparing for the challenging Ultra Marathon, this app is your pocket-sized, top-rated running coach. From 5k, 10k, half marathon, marathon, to the ultra distance, we've got you covered. Rated 4.9/5 on Trustpilot, Runna offers an elite training experience that's second to none.

WHY RUNNA IS THE BEST FIT FOR EVERY RUNNER:

1) Personalised Training:
Runna's expertly crafted training plans use proven science to fit your unique runner profile. Tackle any distance: 5k, 10k, half marathon, marathon or even ultra marathon, with us by your side.

2) Sync and Track:
Instantly sync your runs with Strava and monitor your workouts live on compatible devices*. Set the right pace and map your progress with ease.

3) All-Round Runner Support:
We adopt a holistic training approach, offering advice on perfect running form, nutrition, and injury management. Every runner is unique, and we cater to that individuality.

4) Strength Meets Endurance:
Enhance your strength and endurance, vital for any race distance. Our plans provide a seamless blend of running and strength training, ensuring you're race-ready.

JOIN THE RUNNA CLUB & COMMUNITY:

1) Connect Worldwide:
Become part of the Runna club: a dynamic community of global runners. Harness the motivation and camaraderie to elevate your performance.

2) Exclusive Perks:
Runna members get exclusive offers from top nutrition, apparel, and event brands. Upgrade your gear and nutrition, preparing for every long run and race.

3) Engage and Progress:
Sign up for trail runs, time-trials, or live yoga and pilates classes. Let your sweat pour, and always stay one step ahead in your training journey.

4) Expert Touch:
Questions? Need guidance? Our team of dedicated experts and customer support staff are here, ensuring you're never alone in your journey.

DIVERSE PLANS FOR EVERY GOAL & DISTANCE:

- Plans spanning from 5k, 10k, half marathon, marathon, to ultra distances.
- Starting out? Try our Couch to 5k plans.
- Boost overall strength and endurance with functional fitness plans.
- Recovery plans for post-race or injury periods.
- Prepping for a triathlon? We have specific plans for you.
- And many more designed to keep you fit and always running.

COMPATIBLE DEVICES:

Runna is compatible with a wide range of devices including Apple Watch, Garmin, COROS, Suunto and Fitbit. This ensures you can track your runs, regardless of your preferred device.

RUNNA PREMIUM:

For the ultimate running experience, subscribe to Runna Premium for monthly or annual plans. Track your progress, monitor your pace, and burn those calories with personalised workout plans and support. 

Payments and renewal:
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
- You can manage or turn off auto-renew in your Account settings at any time after purchase
- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active period.

APPLE HEALTH USAGE:

Runna uses your health data to provide accurate heart rate, distance and pace information during your runs and workouts on Apple Watch. 

AGE 18+
You may download and use our App provided you are aged 18 or older. We may delete your account (and associated data) if you are under such age

هل تتسائلين ""متى ستبدأ الدورة الشهرية الخاصة بك؟"" نحن لدينا الحل! الدورة الشهرية هي جزء طبيعي من حياة كل امرأة، لذلك تم تخصيص هذا التطبيق لمساعدتك في تتبع مواعيد الدوره الشهريه وأعراضها، مما يسهل عليكي معرفة توقيت الحيض و الاباضة " التبويض" المتوقعة لاشهر قادمة لزيادة فرص الحمل ومتابعة تغيراتك في الدورة الشهرية و المزاجية لك في حياة كل امرأة

يساعدك التطبيق في تنظيم و تتبع مواعيد الدورة الشهرية بدقة، مما يتيح لك معرفة تاريخ بدء الدورة الشهرية القادمة ويعتبر مفيد ايضا للنساء اللواتي يخططن الحمل أو يردن تجنبه و إذا كنتي تخططين الحمل ، يمكنكي استخدام هذا البرنامج لتحديد أوقات الخصوبة و الاباضة " التبويض"  لادارة صحتك الإنجابية و حياة كل امرأة

سنحسب أيامك الأكثر خصوبة لتحديد أوقات الخصوبة و الاباضة " التبويض" بدقة مع تطبيقنا. حددي أوقات الإباضة وتتبع الدوره الشهريه لتحققي التوازن المثالي لصحتك و حياة كل امرأة ."

عند البحث عن أفضل و اقوى تطبيق لحساب الدوره الشهريه ولتحديد أوقات الخصوبة و الاباضة " التبويض" و زيادة فرص الحمل فيكون تطبيقنا لأنه يتمت بالميزات الآتية:

- يتمتع التطبيق بواجهة رائعة وسهلة الاستخدام يناسب النساء و المراهقات مقارنةً بباقي التطبيقات الأخرى الخاصة ال دوره الشهريه و تحديد أوقات الخصوبة و الاباضة " التبويض "  إذا كنتي تخططين الحمل . 

-تسجيل مواعيد بدء دوره الشهريه و تنظيم مواعيد دورات الطمث القادمة و اوقات الخصوبة و الاباضة " التبويض"  و تتبع مدى انتظام دوره الشهريه .

-معلومات ونصائح عن الصحة الإنجابية والجنسية و مقالات وكل ما يدور في نفسك حول الحمل والدورة الشهرية و الخصوبة و الاباضة " التبويض"  الطمث و الحيض والتغيرات الجسمانية التي تحدث في سن المراهقة و باقي العمر و  حياة كل امرأة .

-توقع أيام الإباضة و تحديد نافذة الخصوبة لزيادة فرص الحمل أو تجنبه.

-اعطاء تنبيهات للمستخدمات قبل موعد دوره شهريه و أوقات الخصوبة و الاباضة " التبويض"المتوقع تكوني مستعدة لاقترابها واخذ الحيطة اللازمة .

- وصول اشعارات ل موعد الاباضة "التبويض" و فرص الحمل لديكي والتحكم ب اشعارات مخصصة قمتي باضافتها لتنبيهك بالموعد في المحدد اللازم .

-تقديم أدوات لتسجيل توجهات المزاج والطاقة والنشاط خلال دوره شهريه معينة مما يساعد في تحديد الأنماط دورة شهرية ومعرفة تغير هرموناتك

لحساب الفترات الغير منتظمة في دورة شهرية ، يمكنك تتبع طول حاسبة الدورة الشهرية و أوقات الخصوبة و الاباضة " التبويض"  على مدى عدة أشهر. ابدئي بتحديد اليوم الأول من دورتك واحسبي عدد الأيام في حاسبة الدورة الشهرية والتبويض و  أوقات الخصوبة و الاباضة  حتى بداية دورتك الشهرية القادمة. الحاسبة الوردية هذه العملية لعدة دورات لمعرفة نمط دورتك الشهرية من حاسبة الدورة الشهرية والتبويض 

ولكن لا تقلقي، فعدم انتظام دورة شهرية أمر شائع جداً بين مختلف السيدات وليس بالضرورة أن يكون بسبب مشاكل صحية خطرة و حساب الدورة الشهرية يختلف من سيدة الى سيدة ومختلف حياة كل امرأة


استخدام تطبيقنا سيسهل على النساء و المراهقات فهم أوقات دوراتهن والتعامل بشكل أفضل مع الأعراض المرتبطة بها و  حساب الدوره الشهريه الدقيق في دورة الشهرية يعتبر أداة قوية لتنظيم حياتهم بشكل فعال. يمكنكي تحميل التطبيق مجاناً والحصول على جدول الدورة الشهرية في حاسبة الدورة الشهرية  و  أوقات الخصوبة و الاباضة " التبويض" وايام الطمث  وتقييمات ونصائح حول كيفية استخدامه بأفضل طريقة التطبيق يدعم جميع مواعيدك الشهرية ويعمل كمتابع ممتاز و اعطاءك جدول الدورة الشهرية لدوراتك الشهريه و أوقات الخصوبة و الاباضة " التبويض"

التطبيق يعتمد حساب دوره الشهريه بشكل يسهل الوصول للتنبؤ بالتاريخ المتوقع لفترات الحيض وايام التبويض

باختصار، يعتبر تطبيق حاسبة الدورة الشهرية و التبويض شريكًا مهمًا للمرأة  و حياة كل امرأة في رحلتها الصحية لمعرفة كل ما يهمها عن العادة الشهرية، حيث يوفر لها الأدوات والمعلومات اللازمة لفهم وإدارة صحتها الإنجابية في الحاسبة الوردية بكل يسر وراحة.

"إحدى العوامل في تحقيق الحمل بنجاح هي معرفة أيام التبويض الخصبة. يقدم تطبيق 'حاسبة الدورة الشهرية و التبويض' حلولاً علمية متقدمة ل حساب ايام التبويض للحمل بدقة يستطيع المستخدمون تحديد و حساب ايام التبويض للحمل بناءً على معلومات دورة شهريه وتغيرات الهرمونات. بفضل حساب ايام التبويض للحمل هذه الميزة، يمكن للمستخدمين تحديد الأوقات المثلى لمحاولة الحمل، مما يزيد من فرص نجاح الحمل وتحقيق الأمومة المنشودة بصحة وسلامة و حياة كل امرأة .

هذا التطبيق يعتبر وسيلة لكل فتاة من أجل الإلمام بكل ما يتعلق بدورتها و حياة كل امرأة لتكوني ملكة كل الاوقات

Right Calories App will provide you access to subscribe in Bahrain’s top healthy and delicious meal plan packages. The App will allow you to select packages that are suitable to your BMI and required calories intake, select your meals and be informative about nutrition consumed in the meals.

Right Calories is there to fix the misconceptions of healthy food definition. Our mission is to provide our customers with all meal types such as pizzas and burgers cooked in healthy ingredients. Right Calories will provide you with all nutrition facts about the meals for transparency purposes. 

Our app will analyze your profile and suggest the best calories intake required for your daily consumption to help you in your meal plan selection.

description:
"OKOK International" is an application designed to work with smart Bluetooth weight scales and has successfully helped millions of users efficiently achieve their ideal weight! Through this application, you can use a Bluetooth scale to check and manage various health indicators related to weight, body fat, body water content, and muscle. Additionally, OKOK provides weight records, weight trend analysis to document every change, and supports adding multiple family members' weight.

This application is compatible with Apple's "Health" app, and with your authorization, we can synchronize all weight data to your Health app.

Payment: If you choose to purchase a membership service, the fee will be charged to your iTunes account.
Subscription Renewal: If you choose automatic subscription, your Apple iTunes account will be automatically charged 24 hours before the expiration, extending the subscription period upon successful payment.

Cancellation of Subscription: To cancel your subscription, manually open your Apple device's "Settings" >>> go to "iTunes & App Store" >>> tap on "Apple ID," select "View Apple ID," enter the "Account Settings" page, tap "Subscriptions," and choose to cancel the OKOK membership. If you do not cancel the subscription at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period, it will automatically renew.

For more information about the "OKOK International" application and the services we provide, you can visit http://www.tookok.cn/index_en.html.

WHOOP is the leading wearable that turns comprehensive health insights into daily action. By capturing dozens of data points every second, WHOOP delivers personalized Sleep, Strain, Recovery, Stress, and health insights—24/7. WHOOP uses those insights to provide coaching based on your body’s unique physiology and recommends everything from when to go to bed to new daily behaviors that will help you reach your goals.

If you’re new to WHOOP, you can try both the wearable and app free for 1 month. Terms and conditions apply.

WHOOP is screenless, so all your data lives in the WHOOP app—for a distraction-free focus on your health. The WHOOP app requires a WHOOP wearable.

How it works:

Healthspan*: A powerful way to quantify your age and slow your Pace of Aging. Backed by leading longevity research, it pinpoints the daily habits that impact your long-term health.

Sleep: WHOOP helps you understand how well you sleep each night by measuring your Sleep Performance. Every morning, WHOOP provides a Sleep score from 0 to 100%. Sleep Planner calculates how much sleep you need to recover, tailored to your habits, schedule, and goals. You can even set a Haptic Alarm that wakes when you're fully rested, or at a specific time, with gentle vibration. Quality sleep is essential for improving your healthspan, metabolic mental resilience, recovery, and performance.

Recovery: WHOOP lets you know how ready you are to perform by measuring your heart rate variability, resting heart rate, sleep, and respiratory rate. You'll get a daily Recovery score on a scale of 1 to 99%. When you're in the green, you're ready for strain, when you're in the yellow or red, you may want to evaluate your training program.

Strain: WHOOP does more than just track your activity–it measures cardiovascular and muscular exertion to give you the most comprehensive view of the demands you put on your body. Each day, Strain Target will provide a Strain score from 0 to 21 and recommend your optimal target exertion range based on your Recovery score.

Stress: WHOOP gives you daily insights to pinpoint your stressors, understand your physiological response, and discover techniques to help manage. Get a real-time stress score from 0-3 and, based on your score, choose a breathwork session to enhance your alertness or increase relaxation.

Behaviors: WHOOP tracks over 160+ daily habits and behaviors—like alcohol intake, medication, and more—to better understand how these behaviors impact your body. WHOOP provides weekly guidance for behavior change and helps set accountability goals with the Journal and Weekly Plan features.

WHOOP Coach: Ask questions about your health & fitness and get highly personalized, on-demand answers. Using your unique biometric data, the latest performance science, and generative AI, WHOOP Coach generates responses on everything from training plans to why you’re feeling tired.

Menstrual Cycle Insights: Go beyond period tracking to better understand your fifth vital sign and get tailored cycle-based insights.

What else you can do in the WHOOP app:

• Dig into the details: See heart rate zones, VO₂ Max, steps, and more trends over time to adjust your behaviors, training, sleep and more based on your goals.

• Join a team: Stay motivated and accountable by joining a team. Chat directly with your teammates in the app, or as a coach, see how your team's training is going.

• Apple Health: WHOOP integrates with Apple's Health app to sync activities and personalize your experience.

WHOOP provides products and services designed for general fitness and wellness purposes. WHOOP products and services are not medical devices, not intended to treat or diagnose any disease, and should not be used as a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. All content available through WHOOP products and services is for general informational purposes only.

Discover the future of health and performance.

*Some availability restrictions apply.

Transform your garden into a thriving paradise with Nurvo, your personal garden management assistant.
Keep every plant, tree, and task perfectly organized — all in one beautiful, intuitive app.
With Nurvo, you’ll always know what your garden needs and when. Stay on top of watering, pruning, and care schedules with smart reminders and expert insights delivered daily. Whether you’re tending to a single plant or managing an entire orchard, Nurvo helps your garden grow stronger, healthier, and more vibrant than ever.

Key Features
• Tree Management — Add unlimited trees with emoji icons, record planting dates, and monitor growth progress.
• Task Tracking — Create and manage gardening tasks, link them to specific trees, set reminders, and mark them complete with a single tap.
• Daily Tips — Receive expert gardening advice every day, covering watering, pruning, soil care, and seasonal techniques.
• Beautiful Design — Enjoy a clean, modern glassmorphism interface with soft colors and smooth animations.
• Statistics — Track completion rates, view weekly and monthly progress, and measure your garden’s overall health.
• Privacy First — Works entirely offline, requires no account, and includes absolutely no ads or subscriptions.

The HealthPass by MedNet App is a customer-centric solution designed exclusively for MedNet members. It enables beneficiaries to interact with their respective MedNet and facilitates dealing with health-related matters in a digitalized way.

The Garmin Connect™ app is your one-stop source for health and fitness data. Whether you’re training for a race, keeping active or just staying on top of your health, Garmin Connect provides the information and inspiration you need to reach your goals. 
 
Once you pair your phone(1)with a Forerunner®, Venu®, fēnix® or another compatible Garmin device(2), you can review your tracked activities and health metrics. Plus, you can create workouts, build courses and challenge your friends on the leaderboard. 
 
With Garmin Connect you can: 
 
- Personalize your home screen, so the most helpful information is instantly visible 
- Analyze your activities with detailed statistics(3)
- Create customized workouts and courses 
- Review trends in health metrics like heart rate and steps 
- Earn badges for accomplishments 
- Sync with other apps like Apple Health, MyFitnessPal and Strava 
- Get support for Garmin devices and their features 
 
Learn more about Garmin devices and how they work with the Garmin Connect app at Garmin.com. 
 
(1) See compatibility requirements at Garmin.com/BLE 
(2) See a full list of compatible devices at Garmin.com/devices
(3) See Garmin.com/ataccuracy  
 
Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

GlobeMed FIT: Your Digital Health Insurance App

GlobeMed FIT  is our self-service health insurance app & digital wellness tool.
It allows insured members to manage their insurance online, anytime, anywhere!

• Insured members can manage their claims and those of their dependents including reimbursement & chronic prescription refills, and pre-approval requests.
• Use the e-card.
• Locate the nearest healthcare provider within the network.
• Stay informed on all the details they need on their chronic medications with real-time updates on dispensing status, instructions to take the drug as prescribed, pill reminder feature, etc.
• Access policy details and much more!

Step up your fitness game with Sweatcoin! 

Looking for a fun way to boost your fitness & get rewarded? Sweatcoin, the viral walking app, is here to transform your steps into real-world rewards! Earn Sweatcoins with every step you take and redeem them for exclusive gadgets, sports gear, and amazing experiences in our marketplace! 

The more you walk, the more you earn! And the more you earn, the more you walk! 


Discover the benefits:

- Effortless step tracking: Sweatcoin’s pedometer runs smoothly in the background, tracking your steps accurately without draining your battery. It’s your perfect fitness companion, whether you’re walking, running, or working out at home.

- Unlock rewards: Use your sweatcoins to access incredible offers and discounts that you won’t find anywhere else. Your fitness journey has never been so rewarding!

- Get moving, get badges: Hit your daily step goals and collect unique badges for each milestone achieved.

- Calling all streak masters: Compete with friends to see who can maintain the longest step streak. Fitness is more fun with a little friendly competition!


Features

Privacy first: We use a secure, proprietary algorithm to count your steps. Your location and personal data stay private—only you have access to your information.
Pedometer: Accurate step tracking with minimal battery usage.
Device compatibility: Available on iOS devices. Apple Watch users can also enjoy Sweatcoin.

AMH (American Mission Hospital)

What started as an idea in New Brunswick, New Jersey, USA and are now celebrating one hundred and twenty years of hard, dedicated work in the field of medical care.  

American Mission Hospital, a non-profit healthcare institution, has flourished with strong community support for a century and is preparing for a bright future ahead. 

We provide high-quality healthcare at an affordable cost to all who seek care, and we provide this care based on the biblical principles of compassion, grace, and love. We work towards being a leader in setting the standards of high quality, and innovative healthcare in Bahrain. 

Now we have established our presence in 4 locations. 
•	Manama
•	Saar
•	Amwaj 
•	Riffa 

And work with a group of most talented doctors from around the globe. 

Venturing into the future, we take one step into the digital world with the introduction of the AMH app. 

Top Features of the AMH App: 

•	View Providers: View the complete list of Departments and Providers and their schedules in different locations.

•	Book & Cancel Appointments: Book Appointments from anywhere 24/7 all days; centralized calendar for all locations and view the upcoming and completed appointments.

•	Lab & Radiology results: Access your Lab and Radiology results instantly once the result is ready and verified.

•	Daily Log/ Prescription Check: Keep a check on medicines to be taken every day.

•	Notifications: Receive notifications about general announcements and your upcoming appointments and prescription reminders.

•	Check BMI: Keep a constant check on weight gain or loss which could tell you more about your health 

•	Check Status of Blood Pressure: Find out if you are in the safe zone or if you need to visit the doctor.

•	Promotions & Packages: View the promotions and packages available at AMH.

•	News: Regular updates on AMH and more! 

                             Download the App for FREE today!

تطبيق الملكة هو أفضل تطبيق نسائي باللغة العربية للنساء يساعد حساب الدورة الشهرية، حساب الحمل، متابعة الحمل، متابعة أعراض الحمل طيلة فترة الحمل لحمل سليم وصحي، حساب ايام التبويض عبر حاسبة التبويض لزيادة فرص الحمل.
تطبيق الملكة يساعدك لتعيشي حياة صحية وأسرية  أفضل عبر متابعة الدورة الشهرية،  تاخر الدورة ، حساب ايام التبويض لزيادة فرص الحمل  والمساعدة فى حمل متأخر للنساء ايضا يعرفك فترة الامان كوسيله امنه لمنع الحمل بالإضافة إلى متابعة أعراض الحمل عبر اسابيع الحمل  ويعرفك اعراض الحمل المبكرة لحمل صحي ومريح
تعرفي أكثر على مميزات تطبيق الملكة .. 
 حساب الدورة الشهرية ومتابعة الدورة الشهرية : 
تسجيل مواعيد الدورة الشهرية، وتلقي تنبؤات دقيقة بموعد الدورة الشهرية القادمة وأيام التبويض.
تسجيل الأعراض الصحية والحالة المزاجية يوميًا للمساعدة على فهم التغيرات في جسمك لحياة أفضل
متابعة تقويم الدورة الشهريه شهريا دورة منتظمة 
حلول الحمل المتأخر للنساء وزيادة فرص الحمل من خلال حاسبة التبويض
حساب أيام التبويض بدقة لتحديد أفضل وقت للحمل.
متابعة الحمل:  
حساب الحمل عبر تقويم الحمل لمعرفة موعد الولادة.
متابعة الحمل طيلة فترة الحمل لحمل صحي وسليم ومريح
استكشاف اعراض الحمل المبكر والحصول على معلومات ونصائح طبية موثوقة من خبراء مختصين.
مجموعة من أهم أدوات  متابعة الحمل اسبوعًا بأسبوع وهم : 
 حاسبة وزن الأم
حاسبة الركلات
حاسبة الانقباضات
خاصية تطور الجنين
تنبيهات بأهم الفحوصات الطبية طوال فترة الحمل
حقيبة المولود اهم المستلزمات للام والجنين الولادة طبيعى او الولادة القيصري
مزايا إضافية أساسية لحساب الحمل والدورة الشهرية:
تنبيهات ذكية لموعد الدورة الشهرية وايام التبويض.
تقويم الحمل لتسجيل مواعيد الطبيب والأحداث المهمة.
تسجيل الأعراض والملاحظات والتغيرات المزاجية وتشخيصها بدقة وتقديم حلول متخصصة.
معرفة أفضل أيام التبويض للحمل وأيضاً فترة الأمان كوسيلة آمنة لمنع الحمل.
تنظيم الدورة الشهرية وأيام الحيض ومتلازمة ما قبل الحيض.
مجتمع داعم للتواصل مع نساء أخريات و مشاركة التجارب والمشكلات الخاصة مع التزام السرية التامة عبر المنتدى الذهبي.
 الاستشارات الطبية النسائية 
احصلي على استشارات طبية نسائية اونلاين مع افضل الأطباء، مخصصة لاحتياجاتكِ، موثوقة و سرية تماماً، متاحة على مدار الساعة لتكونى فى حياة أفضل
تجدين أفضل طبيب / طبيبة متخصصين لقديم لكِ استشارات دقيقة لدعمكِ في جميع مراحل حياة النساء من تنظيم الدورة الشهرية إلى متابعة الحمل، حمل متأخر للنساء، حمل مبكر هدفنا تقديم الافضل والعناية بصحتكِ العامة.

المزايا ذهبية :
  كورسات للنساء للصحة الأنثوية في جميع المراحل
كورسات نسائية مخصصة للمرأة العربية تشمل الصحة الجسدية والنفسية والجمال والرشاقة والاستعداد للحمل وأيضا الطفولة والأمومة وغيرها من المواضيع لحياة أفضل
  المنتدى الذهبي
 منتدى نسائي متكامل تشاركين فيه بكل استفساراتك بحرية وأمان دون تدخل الرجال، ويعرفك على الملكات من مختلف الدول. يمتاز المنتدى الذهبي بخاصية الهوية الخفية والمنشور المثبت.
  مقالات غير محدودة تشمل
الدورة الشهرية
فترة الحمل
مشاكل تأخر الحمل
العلاقة الحميمة
نصائح عن البشرة والشعر والجمال
خسارة الوزن
زيادة الوزن


  نسخة مميزة بدون إعلانات مزعجة
تصفح سلس ومريح عبر تطبيق الملكة وتجربة استخدام مريحة بدون الإعلانات المزعجة، مما يتيح لك التركيز الكامل على محتوى التطبيق دون أي تشويش.
حمّلي تطبيق الملكة الآن مجاناُ وانضمي إلى ملايين النساء اللاتي اخترن الملكة لتكون رفيقتهن في رحلة الأنوثة والأمومة.
